uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail

Class ContentMessageVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail.AbstractVisitor
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail.ContentMessageVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Contexed, Visitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditMessageVisitor, FormContentEditMessageVisitor, TextEditHtmlMessageVisitor

    public class ContentMessageVisitor
extends AbstractVisitor
    visitor to translate a MimeMessage into a HTML fragment.
    Author:
    spb
